In front of you towers a huge GIANT. Make that a GIANTESS... but you are not sure if she is aware of your presence (since you are just so small)

11.content: In front of u is a giant woman, wat do u do and why
11.title: you try to figure out if the giant woman in fro...

choices: Explore the Insides and Look for a Way Out
Wait Inside as the Giantess Goes on with Her Day
Try to Establish Communications
111.content:
In front of you is a rather gigantic young woman, you'd say in her early 20s who at your size of a gnat, might as well have been an entire planet. She was a dark-skinned young woman with long black hair that reached down to her rear. She was also very fat and was wearing a black tank top with a purple skull and a pair of purple jeans that looked painted on. As you fly closer in front of her face, her two moon-sized brown eyes are looking down on you. For some reason, this giantess looks familiar, but you can't remember from where you saw her before. On the other hand, from the looks of it, this giantess did recognize you and was smirking at you as you buzzed in front of her face and then opened her mouth to grin at you.

"Ah-ha," she says. "I can't believe that it happened. I thought she wasn't being serious but here you are, nothing but an insignificant tiny gnat. Barely more than a protozoan to me and me, a titan to you. You've had this coming for a long time. Now, you're an insect and at my mercy." You were now very worried as you see the evil smile of skyscraper-sized pearly whites and even bigger painted purple lips. What is this giantess talking about. From the sounds of it, she believed that you wronged her, but you could not remember what happened between you two. You try and speak with her but your voice is only buzzing to the titanic dark beauty. Then something happened that really worried you.

The giantess opens her mouth wide and you buzz in fear, realizing what's next. You try to fly away, but she rolls her tongue out of her mouth to snatch your tiny form up as you're pulled into her mouth. Before you have any idea what happens, you're sucked into the back towards the throat where your giantess captive, a young woman millions of times bigger than you, gulps deeply, creating a vortex that sucks you down her esophagus. You flutter your wings frantically in an attempt to reposition yourself, but by the time that you're able to fly again, you already pop into her large stomach where the sphincter above closes, leaving you trapped inside.

You look around in disbelief that you actually got swallowed and have to stay airborne to avoid the fat giantess's digestive fluids. Outside, the giantess who ate you lets out a slight belch. "Gnat," she says as she pats her giant bloated stomach, shaking up your current quarters. "The other white meat." With that, she begins to walk, her footsteps shaking the area around you. Now what will you do?
111.title: The Big Gulp

choices: Steps On a Treadmill
Walks into the Kitchen
Reader's Choice
1112.content:
As you're pondering your next move, you hear and feel a series of booms. The dark-skinned punk giantess who swallowed you is continually tapping on her obese stomach, shaking you up in her gut as she gives a fiendish smirk. "Better get cozy in there, little gnat, you're going to be in there for a while." The giantess even grabs her stomach and shakes it up and down as you're forced to fly in a zigzag pattern to avoid the splashing stomach juices. Then she lets out a series of large burps, forcing you to hold whatever it is a gnat like you had for years.

Your captor giggles as she rests her stomach on her coffee table. "You were absolutely delicious," says the giant woman. "And you deserve this odd situation. Enjoy my big comfy tummy while you can, bug, because soon, you'll just be another millimeter on my waistline." The giantess taps her hips before she walks off, leaving you more scared than before. You're not sure what to do and you feel every step the enormous fat titaness who swallowed you makes. You knew you recognized this girl from somewhere but you can't remember where. But for some reason, she seemed to know you, know something about how you got turned into a gnat and she seems to hold a grudge against you for some reason. You shiver as you wonder what she'll do next. You're so busy trying to think of how to survive, a way in which to get out of this giantess's mountainous body doesn't even come to you.

You realize that there doesn't seem to be any way to escape this man-eater (or in your case, gnat-eater), so you fly around until you spot a currently digesting donut in the giant woman's belly and fly down to take a few nibbles out of it. You didn't want to have to stoop so low, but this was a matter of survival. As you're taking bits of donut, you hear the giantess humming a tune to herself as she stomps off somewhere. You can't see it but at that moment, your captor....
1112.title: Yummy, Yummy, Yummy, She's Got Gnat in Her Tummy

choices: The giantess eats, the meal knocking you into the acid
The lady eats, but you avoid a boiling tomb
Reader's choice
11122.content:
Your chubby captor is currently walking into the kitchen to prepare her second course. However, you lack the slightest clue as to what exactly she intends to eat next.

However, you do hear and feel a series of booms that shake the rubbery walls of the stomach you're stuck inside, as the giantess (whose name you can't recall) pats her stomach again.

"Hold on tight, little bug," your captor teases, "my next meal is coming on top of you soon!"

In an attempt to be puked out of this fleshy sac, you ram your insectoid body into the walls repeatedly, hoping to give this gal a stomachache. Unfortunately, such is merely an attempt -- she apparently doesn't feel your weak struggles.

Great. Just great.

What now?
11122.title: The Next Course

choices: half the size you are now
a quarter of gnat size
11123.content: in the outside world the giantess begins to lick her lips and prepares a hookah for smoking she walks over to the kitchen and starts burning coals. "I remember how much smoke makes you sneeze" you hear the giant woman say. She is right about that you aren't allergic but smoke always irritates you. How does this woman know this fact about you? "So you'd better not try to escape my belly otherwise you'll just end up being sucked and smoked into my lungs and if I manage to catch you leaving my mouth I'll make sure you end up trapped inside of my hookah hose forever." The giantess goes over what flavor of tobacco she will smoke "AH! MINT! I know that's your not so favorite" The smell of mint has also always irritated you, she also knows this about you. Meanwhile in the stomach you start to feel strange and almost like you are falling, but it looks like you aren't falling, you're shrinking even smaller! Just how much smaller do you shrink?
11123.title: she gets ready to smoke some hookah, you shrink

131111.content: (very random I know halloween was a few weeks ago) but you land in a soft bowl of mini halloween pumpkin gummys. You look up and see the GIANTESS eye the bowl. "Oh no shes gonna eat me!" you think to yourself. but she turns around and you hear her booming voice say "OH! I ALMOST FORGOT MY WATER" *BOOM* BOOM* BOOM* boom she walks away into the kitchen... you better figure out what you are going to do quick or else you might find yourself inside of her stomach soon!

1311111.content: You look around you and see huge (to you at least) pumpkin shaped gummies that seem to stretch on forever. You try really hard to get your wings to work again but they are still not quite dry enough for flight. You crawl up to the top of the gummy candy you landed on and see that you really are just hopelessly trapped in this candy bowl. The rim is simply too high and the edges are just too far away from you. You try blow on your wings to try them off but all of a sudden you feel a tremor... small at 1st but then louder and louder... boom...boom...you look up and off into the distance and see what makes your heart stop. The Giantess approaches...BOOM...BOOM... You crane your neck up up up and see the giantess towering high above you. BOOM she sits down on a chair next to the table your bowl prison is sitting on... this final huge tremor knocks you off your gummy you were standing on and you fall down in between two other gummy candies. Stunned only for a moment you hear something that makes you really wish your wings worked right about now. "MMM CANDY!" Your vision of the world outside of the bowl is filled with a huge gigantic hand that approaches to eagerly take in some candy... what will you do now?!
1311111.title: you are trapped there is no way out of the bowl

choices: into her mouth
jump for it!
13111111.content: Up up up you are raised until the face of the giantess fills your view. She then opens her mouth and throws a few of the mini size (to her) gummies and begins sucking on them. As she does this you watch in horror as the contents of her mouth are then gulped as she swallows them all. With desperation you yell out "please don't eat me! I am on the gummy in your hand!" But you are way too small to be heard by her. Then the gummy you are on in rolled down her hand and gripped by her thumb and forefinger. Then your world is shifted forward and you look and see the huge gaping mouth of the giantess open ready to catch you and the other gummys being thrown from her hand. Her eyes are shut and mouth is wide open. Being a bug things seem to move a lot slower for you so you could jump but it would mean certain doom depending on where you land... or maybe figure something out once you land in her mouth?
13111111.title: you are snatched by her giant hand!

133.title: You end up on her nose

info.brief_description: One day you are reduced to the size of a gnat (and can also fly). Good luck!
info.description:
You also somehow have the ability to fly. Everyone and everything around you is unaware that in reality you are actually a human. You are not sure how this happened. You must now either accept your fate as a bug and try to live it out or try and make contact with people and see if there is a way to reverse whatever happened to you.

Basically no toilet stuff but feel free to add vore, NO INCEST... that stuff is just gross... also just keep the character the size of a gnat... no growing to 6 inches (but he can get smaller if you wish)
info.pretty_title: Shrunk to the size of a gnat
